  3/** @file    vsip/core/parallel/copy_chain.hpp
  4    @author  Jules Bergmann

  6    @brief   VSIPL++ Library: Pseudo-DMA Chain for par-services-none.

 10#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_COPY_CHAIN_HPP
 11#define VSIP_IMPL_COPY_CHAIN_HPP
 12
 13/***********************************************************************
 14  Included Files
 15***********************************************************************/
 16
 17#include <vector>
 18#include <algorithm>
 19#include <cassert>
 20
 21
 22
 23/***********************************************************************
 24  Declarations
 25***********************************************************************/
 26
 27namespace vsip
 28{
 29
 30namespace impl
 31{
 32
 33class Copy_chain
 34{
 35  // Record for a single copy.
 36  struct Record
 37  {
 38    void*    start_;		// starting address
 39    size_t   elem_size_;	// size of each element (bytes)
 40    int      stride_;		// stride between successive elements
 41    unsigned length_;		// number of elements
 42
 43    Record(void* start, size_t elem_size, int stride, unsigned length)
 44      : start_(start), elem_size_(elem_size), stride_(stride), length_(length)
 45    {}
 46  };
 47
 48  typedef std::vector<Record>      rec_list;
 49  typedef rec_list::const_iterator rec_iterator;
 50
 51  // Constructors.
 52public:
 53  Copy_chain()
 54    : data_size_ (0),
 55      chain_     () 
 56  {}
 57
 58  // Accessors.
 59public:
 60
 61  // Add a new copy record.
 62  void add(void* start, size_t elem_size, int stride, unsigned length)
 63  {
 64    this->chain_.push_back(Record(start, elem_size, stride, length));
 65    this->data_size_ += elem_size * length;
 66  }
 67
 68  // Append records from an existing chain.
 69  void append(Copy_chain chain)
 70  {
 71    std::copy(chain.chain_.begin(), chain.chain_.end(),
 72	      back_inserter(this->chain_));
 73    this->data_size_ += chain.data_size_;
 74  }
 75
 76  // Append records from an existing chain, w/offset.
 77  void append_offset(void* offset, Copy_chain chain);
 78
 79  // Copy data into buffer.
 80  void copy_into(void* dest, size_t size) const;
 81
 82  // Copy data into memory specified by another chain.
 83  void copy_into(Copy_chain dst_chain) const;
 84
 85  // Return number of record in chain.
 86  unsigned size() const
 87  { return this->chain_.size(); }
 88
 89  // Return number of data bytes in chain.
 90  size_t data_size() const
 91  { return data_size_; }
 92
 93  // Member data.
 94private:
 95  size_t              data_size_;
 96  std::vector<Record> chain_;
 97};
 98
 99
100} // namespace vsip::impl
101} // namespace vsip
102
103#endif // VSIP_IMPL_COPY_CHAIN_HPP
